name: Zombies Town Adventure
description:
Zombies Town Adventure is realistic action and adventure based zombies hunting mission games with military commando killing the dead zombies walking in town.

Hold you weapons like sniper and hunt those zombies, amazing controls with realistic block town jungle environment.

Be very careful as those dead zombies will trace you and chase you at vert fast speed as they can smell you, so be careful.

Enjoy freely and have fun.
